channel.title: Pageback - keeps a google cache like copy of your website for zero downtime
channel.description:
[Pageback][1] is a website mirroring service that makes a copy of your website and hosts it on a CDN (Amazon CloudFront + S3) so that it is always available. You can flip to this backup site during an outage or while undergoing maintenance.
Here is a demo mirror site for Hacker News: [hn.getpageback.com][2]
Pageback is now in private beta and I am looking for more folks to try it out. Thanks!
[1]: http://getpageback.com/ [2]: http://hn.getpageback.com
